trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Whiteriver
There was one other sighting in Whiteriver on or around November 29th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswas in town then looked south southeast seen about 6 to 7 lights reddish orange glow kept looking then they were gone then headed home from town and seen jets flying aroung like crazy rapidly gain altitude and decreasing then when almost home seen the 6 to 7 lights again for about 6 seconds then before i could try to record it they disappeard one by one witch was wierd lights were the same color in the same direction south south eastnern arizona unkown how many miles away the lights were many people witnessed this event many people asking questions what is really going on here???
Summary: when in town seen about 6 to 7 reddish orange lights in the south south east. then headed home seen the same lights in the same direction south above a place we call 7 mile hill all wilderness area where lights appeared also seen jets flying the same plac
